title: For Ella Bloor, the Life Time Grand Prix is a real-life adventure
content:
Between 'a really crappy Jeep' and not knowing where she's going live for six months, 'the racing feels like the easy part,' says the Aussie rider.

Read the full article at For Ella Bloor, the Life Time Grand Prix is a real-life adventure on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
